name: Johnny Blackhands
description:
The very first of the 7 Deadly Sinners Series
Johnny Blackhands
Real name: John Caleb
Age: 25
Last seen drinking a bottle of coke alone in the middle of the night, outside of his childhood home

Johnny at first glance has the appearance of a common young adult, some might even say he's quite the handsome fella, those who interacted with him described him as a charming yet quiet individual, one of his old classmates called him the "beloved quiet kid"

On November 19th, 2004, The body of Hyde Caleb and her husband Zach Caleb was found hung on a birch tree 2 miles West of their home. The cause of death was suffocation, the bodies were otherwise completely unharmed, and John was declared missing. In the next 5 months, the state of Virginia was terrorized by a string of unusual murders, the victims seem to have been chosen randomly, they were "stabbed a single time in the jugular" and die shortly after, there seem to be a hand-shaped black mark around almost all of the victims' neck, reason for this is unknown.
John Caleb is currently on top of the suspect list but finding him has proven to be nearly impossible, he continues to be unfound to this day.

Work of @0nulshin
